website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, portable table measures over 6' long yet folds down to a small size, allowing for easy transport.
pros: Folding leg system ensures quick setup and a sturdy playing surface
Steel legs are hardy and reliable
All accessories included, as well as a storage bag
Blue felt looks great on table surface
Most affordable model on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. That’s all. The table is not straight and the balls roll to the edges. We have fixed the levelers but no luck. I know that it’s a business to sell this product but if this company had integrity to make the table correctly people would recommend this pool table. Integrity+recommendation =$$$$$. I will just make the best out of this table. Even if it’s not a professional table it should still be made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy again..
customer_reviews.text: Just finished the setup, which consists of un-packaging the pool table and unfolding the legs. Did need some leveling adjustments and was shooting pool. The sticks that come with the table are pretty useless, but all in all, nice table for the money. Update: have had the table for two years, and it has an issue with ball roll and leveling. The felt is pretty wore out.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Will not level, crowning issues, found similar better option on amazon....
customer_reviews.text: We loved the size and the fold-able capability, the blue was pretty too, but the table just would NOT level, it had serious crowning issues and it was obvious after the first day that the top was warped. We tried for a day or so to see if it would get better, but it was just impossible to play a good game on this table. BONUS - I read a review for the fat cat 6' folding table and when I returned this one, I took a chance on that one (all black, on amazon) and that table is constructed TOTALLY different (even though they look the smae online) and has been fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to unboxing this piece of disappointment. One of the corners wasn't screwed on correctly, so it popped up and I cut my hand on it. Not deep but it was enough to be irritating. Table also will not stabilize no matter what. I've been using a level to try to set it up on a flat piece of concrete and no matter what adjustments I make, it won't stay level for more than a minute. I'm extremely disappointed by this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cue not good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable pool table as a gift for my husband. He loves it, the set up or mount up was so easy. The portable pool table was a 6 feet and I believe the normal table is 7 feet. But it is great, my only problem is that the room I put it in is a bit small. So when you are considering buying you need to think about the space and play. After a few uses the cue head came right off. This was a real spoiler.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Belgrove

customer_reviews.title: Table is not level!
customer_reviews.text: We were all very excited to get this table, after returning another one that was nowhere near the price of this one, but after getting it perfectly level, the balls on either side of the table curve towards the pockets and no mater how we adjust the table it is clear that the surface is not level and no way to get it level. We are going to try and get a glass top cut for it and see what happens, but not happy being stuck with a table not levelable 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Jeff-Louis

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good table for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good pool table for the price. Rails could have better bounce but again this is not a professiona table. Adults and grandkids both enjoy playing on this table. Cue sticks that come with table were warped and cracked but Amazon was great on giving a credit so I could replace them. The playing surface itself has a slight bow from center towards the side rails which is a little annoying when the ball will roll to the side rail insted of stopping in place. I also bought 2" diameter balls instead of using the 2 1/4" that comes with the table. Despite a few minor issues I am very happy with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Maddox

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a bad pool table. I do think that it should’ve been cheaper because you can tell it’s cheaply made. It’s a nice size though I feel the need to reflect that because a lot of the reviews don’t. It’s not on the small side. It leans more to a larger table if that helps. If the structure was a lil more built it could easily be a more valuable piece. But overall I do like it. Just afraid it won’t last very long with heavy use. Replace the pool sticks because they are definitely cheap and don’t have the rubber pieces on the end of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: “Convex “pool table ,paper board and metal ,very disappointed while you play it! No worth to buy !
customer_reviews.text: Is heavy !that s fine but the board made from fake wood , paper board materials, like thicker paper board chess board material! Add metal stander on!, that also ok !but when play it! The pool center between stander area “convex” when you play it you will fell every ball will automatically roll to pool sides!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a portable pool table as our garage was going to have to double as our game room and this table had the best reviews of all we considered. Unfortunately you get what you pay for. It is as cheaply made as you might think for the money and after only our second time setting it up the particle board it’s made from has broken in one area under the table. It is pretty heavy so set up is more difficult then expected as it definitely takes 2 reasonabley strong adults to manuver the thing. The leveling legs work pretty well and the playing surface is adequate. It came packaged pretty good and shipping was as implied by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: sunset29544

customer_reviews.title: Good Table to Practice on
customer_reviews.text: Solid and sturdy table. I live in a modest condo, so a full size table was impossible. This table is a nice compromise as it won't permanently take up space. Setting it up isn't too difficult for one strong person, but two people would be ideal. The rails feels like their made of wood, so the balls don't really get a lot of bounce from it. The middle of the table has a slight upward bow to it. I primarily use this table to practice shot drills. Balls are full size, and the cue sticks are decent. Overall, good table to practice on for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J

customer_reviews.title: Poor Table Construction:
customer_reviews.text: We opened the box and set the tale up and this is what we found. The two adjacent corners are dented and miss cut. The four cushions are dead and you barely get a roll of the cushion when the ball hits it. The table is unlevelled and roles a little to the left from the head string. There are 2 small holes on the playing cloth surface. One of the pool sticks is warped. I called Blue Wave Customer Service and they said they were open from 8:00 am - 5:00 pm central standard time. It was 3:43 pm central standard time when I called them. A message was left for them requesting a replacement on the table.
customer_reviews.author: BeyBey

customer_reviews.title: so this was perfect. First one arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our basement, for our teens to play on.. we don't have room for a full size, so this was perfect. First one arrived damaged, water damage and mold. Second one arrived with a small tear in the felt along the side. Too much of a hassle to send back and won't affect play so I am keeping this one as it is for my kids and will likely get some wear and tear pretty quickly. Great table, just annoyed that it came damaged , twice!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peri

customer_reviews.title: Great table w/ a couple of exceptions
customer_reviews.text: This is a great small pool table for just having fun! Setup is very easy although leveling can be a little tricky. I bought this for my dad and he is enjoying it very much. Things to be aware of: The balls are too big and crowd the table, and I am having a hard time trying to find 1-7/8" balls to purchase. Also, the rail cushions have very little action, ball pretty much dies after hitting the rail. You just have to hit a little harder. If this table would ship with 1-7/8" balls, better sticks, and cushions it would easily get 5 stars. I was contemplating 3 stars but we do enjoy playing on it as is.
customer_reviews.author: DazedandConfused

customer_reviews.title: Pool cues are a joke(cheap toy quality), and the pool table is extremely heavy.  Good quality table.
customer_reviews.text: it comes with a pool table carry bag... like anyone but Andre the Giant could carry the table in a bag... The table is extremely heavy (not a good fold up Pool table). Quality for your money... maybe. Definitely not as described. Also, watch the estimated delivery date change to about 10 days past what Amazon says it will be. The table traveled from Washington State to Lubbock TX in just 4 days, but the finally delivery was for 8 days later. I drove 4 hrs to avoid the extra delay in delivery because we were needing it for a party.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yo son bought this with his entire savings. He adores it. It looks great; his friends and ours are impressed with the appearance. My husband helped him level it with the adjustable legs. (We used our own level.) The cues are very light weight, but we bought some heavier, longer ones second-hand. However, the light ones it came with really aren’t bad! One corner is slightly separated now; the black plastic seam is wider. And the feet can pop off/go askew if you aren’t careful when adjusting the table’s position. I am sure this won’t last forever. But for the price, we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: B Glady-Teschendorf

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this product for about 4 months!! no its not a bad table to play on , we keep ours indoors, and no kids play on it, the only down side the adjustable legs at the bottom one has collapsed the nut is supposed to be housed inside the plastic were you can turn the leg to level it out , however one of the nuts have pushed through the plastic housing making it unrepairable , at this I have no way to contact seller directly and it makes it diffuclt to now level the table out
customer_reviews.author: Billy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect table to practice at home! You can store it fairly easily. It takes bank shots, rail shots, and even cross face shots with ease. I had read some reviews that said the balls may be too big for the table, but I don't feel that they are. If you prefer smaller balls, then by all means buy a set of smaller balls, but you really don't have to. The sticks are a bit small, but they are perfect for my daughter who is 8. I prefer to use my own stick, which is regulation length. Overall, I love this table!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: cant get to my local pool room or my club due to the virus. Read the reviews and thought I buy this table. Couldn't be happier. Not the 9 foot table I play on, but great for keeping me in stroke. A lot of trade offs, but also serves the purpose, and provides many hours of enjoyment. Would highly recommend, well made, sturdy, easy to set up and level, and fits in small space. Toss the cues that come with it, and add some better ones. you'll need a helper to unpack and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Fred De Filippo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pool table; it’s provided hours of fun, but the bumpers for the pockets are poorly attached. One of my bumpers is constantly getting dislodged. Also, I wish the carpet was a bit more resistant to scratching; scratched the carpet about three times on the first day. I do, however, recommend this pool table to anyone with a limited amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: jaybe95

customer_reviews.title: Love it, very very very much
customer_reviews.text: Love it, very very very much, i didn't expect much but it turned out to be more than what I wanted and the color is great, it is not anything professional and I would say it much easily to get the balls in the sockets than the professional but it is perfect for my two boys and me to have a great time which is all that matters to me, would buy another one for my Pocono home. I also bought portable Tri-Fold table tennis game that goes on top of this table perfectly and turns it into intense table tennis game:)
customer_reviews.author: eugin

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great table, it’s exactly what I was looking for to relax and play the with my family and friends. I think the balls size is just fine for this table, I wouldn’t bother changing them. The clubs are ok but it is the one thing that could be better, mostly the tips of the clubs which I will try to replace if possible. I hope this helps, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. GAHAN

customer_reviews.title: Great product but SLOW shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected based on the reviews I read. Well built, just the right size for my room and our whole family is having a blast. KEEP IN MIND - it doesn't matter what date you select for shipping, it WON'T be there on that date. The first thing it has to do it get into your area, and then whatever fright company they send it to will have to schedule a delivery with you. It could take a week longer than promised...keep that in mind when making plans.
customer_reviews.author: M Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little practice table for me. Its lightweight and can be moved easily or stored away in the included heavy-duty storage bag. Its not a professional table before anyone starts asking questions. Once I leveled it out, the balls roll really good. There are some quirks but for this price its not worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: Trying to contact for info item damaged
customer_reviews.text: Hello. I wanted to do this privately but it seems to be impossible. I recieved my item a couple days ago. I dont want to leave a bad review... I will fix it. My table arived damaged from one side. This nation wide situation is complicated. I dont have the original box anymore i threw it out., please let me know what we can do...I have pictures
customer_reviews.author: Johanyvette Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Okay table. Poor cue!!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this table is just okay worst than what I thought before ordering. However, the pool cue is so bad with cheap wood. I wouldn't buy this if I notice the cue quality. And cue head is not a real cue head, it's also wood not like a real cue head. Be careful if you want to buy this. After one day's use of pool cue, it starts to look like the third image and become broken at the cue head
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the money...
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a pretty great little pool table. It was extremely easy to set up. It’s sturdy and well made and my kids love it. I really like that you can easily fold it up and store it. My only complaint is that it’s a little warped in the center but honestly it’s too much of a hassle to send it back for a replacement. It is pretty heavy. I will likely purchase the smaller balls as the regular sized balls are a little much on the table.
customer_reviews.author: HollyB007

customer_reviews.title: Great portable table for tight spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to feel like a normal pool table. I used smaller balls then it came with to help it feel larger then it is because it came with full size. The metal corners come off to more easily fit through tight corners when moving. I was able to get it in my attic and works really well with the space. Folds up in minutes for an exercise space. Would recommend 2 ppl for moving it more then a few feet.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Paul

customer_reviews.title: good table at a good price
customer_reviews.text: works out great for us..easy to setup and no assembly needed..leveled the table and we love the way it plays..balls roll true and nice cushion action..at only about 115 pounds, we plan on taking this with us on our next vacation..in the meantime we will enjoy it in our basement
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: Package was a little bit damaged in one corner but it wasn't enough to do the table itself any damage. Although the careful wrapping and protective coverings were certainly handled with care. The table holds up pretty well tho and nicely sturdy table top. Easy to set up and adjust to your accuracy. Pool sticks are evenly and not bent in any way. Package arrived at its scheduled appointed time. We played a few good games and its overall pretty good 👍
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Howard

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged. Great customer support
customer_reviews.text: I'll have to change my initial review to reflect the help I received from customer support. I called the number in my users manual. And they're sending me replacement parts. When a company makes good on a shipping damaged product, that's awesome support. Thanks blue wave. It is a pretty cool little pool table.
customer_reviews.author: ReTodd

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Some minor scrapes after inspection on delivery. The table is delivered on a palet so the delivery guy had to set it down in the garage. Two people easily moved it in the house and it didn't need balancing. Overall decent table for the price while I'm used to 7ft-8ft tables
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P

customer_reviews.title: Price is volatile
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this just before Christmas as a present and although it's in good quality and came better than expected the price was significantly more. it's now almost 100 dollars cheaper. More shady practices from shady people to sell their products at exorbitant prices. For that I say wait until you see the price closer to 260 where the price seems to sit.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and well made
customer_reviews.text: Good product and well made. Paid $385 with free shipping. Placed on carpet in "man cave", and didn't even need to balance with the adjustable legs. Arrived in good condition, well packed for protection. Even though its portable, very study as you can lean on it while playing. Ad indicates it weighs 160 pounds, but believe it to be closer to 200 pounds. You will need three good strong backs if want to take it up stairs. Quality balls included, plus a rack, brush, two chalks, and two cues. The cues are light and fairly short, so may want to upgrade there. If you're looking for a smaller pool table for smaller space, would highly recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: bing

customer_reviews.title: Good value, not very portable
customer_reviews.text: Overall good pool table for the money. Keep in mind this is not a light table. Heavier than I expected but very sturdy. Cues are low quality. I received one warped cue and the other is straight. Good purchase, with good foldable legs, but limited portability due to weight.
customer_reviews.author: TNS

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived on time. There was no assembly so I was playing pool with in fifteen minutes. The table was bigger than I thought it would be but Iove it. Everything you need to start playing immediately is included.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great fin during hard virus times!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying some little light weight pool table. That is not the case. This table is really nice and sturdy. Even if you bump it the balls don’t move. I did order regular cue sticks and I am very happy I did. The cue sticks that come with the table are small. We have had hours of indoor fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Michaelis

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool table.. my husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The pool is nicely built, all the balls, cues, and chalks are great. Everything comes complete. The size in general is not too big and not too small perfect for gatherings and it is easy to fold. The only problem was that the pool table surface was not leveled straight or idk if it was the legs but the balls would roll over mostly to one side. We put a piece of wood under a leg which helped straighten it. Not sure if it was the manufacturer or something during the shipping process. Overall we enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Selena Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I like it. I contacted manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Could not level it. Balls roll to both long rails from the middle. Must be warped up in middle. Other than that I like it. I contacted manufacturer, they said will send another me in Feb. We will see if they do, and if it is level, or as good as can be for the price. And the bumpers are not very good. But I don't want to expect to much for the price.
customer_reviews.author: coco

customer_reviews.title: Arrived warped.
customer_reviews.text: The pool table looks great but it had a crown in the table. All the cue balls would roll to the rails. The MDF must’ve gotten wet. Impossible to play and have fun. I returned the table and purchased another elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality, arrived damaged and table is warped
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived damaged. We set it up and it looks nice but it is warped throwback fashion that makes it unusable as a pool table. Bumpers and pool sticks are very poor quality. Returning it for more than one reason.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Solid table for small space. We have this in a spare room. The kids and my husband periodically play, and it is always good for entertainment when we have company.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived on time, securely packaged and no broken parts. Easy to unbox and assemble with help of another person. Opening legs is all required to assemble. The table itself looks great, doesn’t look cheap. My family hasn’t stopped using it since I got it. I would buy again and recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Leveling issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. We were having issues leveling it properly, so we brought it all the way down thinking to start over on the leveling process. We even checked the level of our floor to see if that was the issue, but it was dead on so it’s the table itself that is not leveled properly. Being that it would be hassle to return, we just chose to stay with it, but I am most definitely unsatisfied and desplegases with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Perez

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: It has been since Christmas and the table get used a couple times a week. Holding up very well the action is good and the quality is excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lilian C

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The table is a good value, reasonably easy to move and fold, nice size for a portable table. There was damage to the table when it arrived, customer service sent me another brand new table. Their customer service was great. Would buy from then again in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie M

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I had misgivings when I was placing the order, but I was pleasantly surprised. The table is quite sturdy and level. It's been constantly in use for the last 2 months and holding up very well so far!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Delivery exceptional
customer_reviews.text: Pros: delivery promised 3-6, was delivered 3:19 Nice appearance, reasonably construction, ease of getting the table ready for play. Cons: both cues are so warped they are useless
customer_reviews.author: milehi

customer_reviews.title: Received broken with 2 bend pool sticks without tips..
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a corner pocket broken,looked like it had been dropped while being shipped,both pool sticks were bent and the tips were just wood,obviously the tips were missing,had to buy 2 new pool cues,pretty much had to fix the table right when it was received.
customer_reviews.author: josh voeltz

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not what i was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This table is okay but mainly for the kids to have fun on. even if i didn't have the space for a standard table i wouldn't buy this one again. it's a fun kids table but it was much smaller than i envisioned it and can't stand playing on it (mainly because I'm used to playing on an 8' table)
customer_reviews.author: NotOnline

customer_reviews.title: No assembly needed - this is actually a good value!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few days now. Quality a bit better than i expected. Action is fine, i think alot of the issues others have with table being a tad off kilt can be cured with a leveler and the feet adjusters at the bottom of the legs of the table. I had an issue with the balls rolling a tad to one side, then i fiddled with the feet adjusters and now its perfect. Would be 5 stars except the cues are total garbage. They need better tips.... Or any tips for that matter- they have none.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Sledgfield

customer_reviews.title: Pool Sticks are warped
customer_reviews.text: Trying to do an exchange of the pool sticks but it seems I will be exchanging the table and sticks. The sticks are warped and uneven, Can you please reach out to me so we can fix this issue?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but quirky
customer_reviews.text: Pockets are a bit large (side) and the cues are garbage overall; table runs fast compared to most pool halls (may just be because not broken in) and bumpers/walls are nice. Balls are good quality and very happy w the purchase. Great for practice/killing some time.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyMike78

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: The rails are garbage with little to no rebound, nothing like a real table so unless you plan on never banking or kicking any shots, I would NOT recommend this flimsy "table". It's not even felt, more like spray-of fabric fuzz. You are better off buying a used table, or spending another 150 more for something better. Save yourself the disappointment and frustration snd DON'T BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Overall Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how sturdy the table is. I was expecting less with metal folding legs but this pool table is very well made. It is lightweight too, so it is very convenient if you want to move it over a few feet and of course - folding it to relocate somewhere further. The quality of the cue sticks it comes with could be better and the felt is not as vibrant of a blue as pictured. I would rate it 5 stars if the felt was accurate to the picture and cue sticks were better, but hey; 4 stars is still a good rating.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad table for the price and fits well in our small space. My only complaint is after one night of use, the cue sticks are cracked. Like the table overall, though. Haven’t been able to find a way to contact the seller even though there is a 180 day warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Hwarrennnn

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with cuts in the felt - awaiting replacement
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited when I got this pool table, but when I opened it and set up the table I found that there was a cut in the left side of the table and as well on one of the edges. The reason I am giving it 3 stars is because the table is still playable, but it is annoying getting a product that is defective, I am awaiting a replacement. Another thing I noticed was that even after you level the table, the actual field is slightly slanted to the left, most balls end up on that side. I will update my review once I receive the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy molina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. We got the Hathaway for family fun and the pool table has held up so far - even to the kids from around the neighborhood. Looks better in person, delivery was easy and yes it showed up with no damage (double boxed in cardboard).
customer_reviews.author: Tony A

customer_reviews.title: Pool table looks great but part of it is broken
customer_reviews.text: We just unpacked the pool table and it looks awesome! However, one of the corner pieces has come undone from the table which is causing the railing to be separated from the actual pool table itself. I think it could be fixed if we are sent a new corner piece and hardware. We would have to disassemble part of it but I think it’s a doable fix. If the manufacture is reading this review, could you send this to us before Christmas? - Kevin
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dougher

customer_reviews.title: Quilty, durability, looks
customer_reviews.text: Nice pool table for the money had to return the first one due to table being warped causing the balls to roll to the rails. Had no problem returning and getting it replaced. This one seems good only had for about a week. So hopefully we can get use out of it for a few years. Its great for small places.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie Palmiter

customer_reviews.title: Great tabke!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect pool table for any game room. Love it! Not bulky and plays like a professional
customer_reviews.author: JRT

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a broken edge, and ripped a couple of places. I can see why as it's Cheaply made. Good concept but bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nadj

customer_reviews.title: Kids game room or tight spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Nice table for the money. I ended up returning it for personal reasons, but it was sturdier than it looks and played well for it's size. This is definitely a table for really tight spaces or kids.
customer_reviews.author: Albert G

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived damaged. The table was not completely connected to the sides and one of the pockets was not secured and a screw actually fell out where it was supposed to be holding in. There was also a few scuffs and scratches. Seems to play alright, but is affected slightly by the imperfections. Too much a hassle to attempt to find a box to return the item and there was no place to message the seller to make them aware.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Riden

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but box should be better padded.. table was broken mabee to heavy for shipper as they brought it insde the house and was broken when I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The smaller size works great for my basement
customer_reviews.text: The smaller size works great for my basement. The table is solidly built even though it is portable. The weight is ideal as it can be moved to another location without too much trouble. It comes with full size balls which are good for practice. The only complain is that the cues are shorter than standard size.
customer_reviews.author: Kin Ng

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if the pool sticks actually had TIPS on them!!!!! We just opened the box and set it up so everyone could play, and now we cant!!!! Seriously disappointed , obviously someone wasnt doing there job when they packed it up!!!
customer_reviews.author: LindaH

customer_reviews.title: Unresponsive Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived damaged and unplayable. Spent an entire day on hold, trying to call the customer service number on the box. They told me to respond to a warranty claim email and to include pictures of the damage, which I did. Despite sending a few more follow-up emails, I heard nothing back after nearly a month. So, I ended up just returning it through Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase. The table folds down easily. We set it up in our living room and play then take it back down. It's as easy as that. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the money we paid, it is a deal ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money we paid, it is a deal. We always had dilemma on how to entertain our guests, now they don't want to leave. It also brings family together, something that was totally unexpected (-:
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Bag is not as sturdy as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Pool table looks very nice however bag has small rips thru it. Hopefully they will send me a new one.
customer_reviews.author: hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Pool table had some scuffs on the edges and a few loose corner covers. Freight delivery was an absolute nightmare. Inexperienced driver took out power line after delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Durable and good quality. Be prepared it is heavy. We shall see how the pockets hold up. It's great that it came with a carrying cover. I would recommend thus product.
customer_reviews.author: Dionas Turner

customer_reviews.title: ... after waiting a month and it has what looks like 2 cigarette burns in it and a slice in ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it after waiting a month and it has what looks like 2 cigarette burns in it and a slice in the cloth on one side
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: portable
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 4 star because it is NOT Portable. when I think of portable I think of easy to move back and forth. This is pretty heavy and is not a 1 man job. You'd probably need at least 2 guys for this. but other than that no problem. its pretty sturdy. its really good for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Lor

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with delivery. Arrived in great condition. Bought for a 12 yr old. He loves it! Has a box to store the balls . It is very heavy and best to carry and set up with at least 3 people . We purchased a tarp to protect when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great condition, easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly what I expected it to be. Came in four days and had no damage what so ever! Super sturdy was pop and go! No level issues either . Perfect for my four kids to play with
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani.desouza

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my son who was turning 18. I wanted to gift something he wouldn't expect as he is hard to buy for (he doesn't ask for much). He LOVES this table and plays alone, with friends and it even provides family time as we play together.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and great for small spaces. Table feels same size as a bar table. This is foldable so great to store when that extra space is needed.
customer_reviews.author: PDP15

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice! Great look
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice! Great look, simple out of the box pull out assembly. Good for practicing. As noted by others, the sticks are good for kids, but you will want something better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for my 10 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Zero assembly required, just fold out legs and your ready to play. It's perfect for my 10 yr old, he loves it. Had it 1 month and no problems so far
customer_reviews.author: steve c

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like this portable very much, great size for home use and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cissy Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Does not play like a real pool table
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Racey

customer_reviews.title: Warped and dead rails
customer_reviews.text: Warped and dead rails. save your money. looked beautiful but it was useless balls went to side rails not able to play on at all.
customer_reviews.author: E. Z

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, easy to store, awesome to learn on.
customer_reviews.text: Hubs and I absolutely love this table. It was super easy to put up. Just unfold the legs and pow...done. With a few instructional videos, I have truly improved my game. It comes with 2 cues, a ball set, table brush, chalk, and a carrying bag for easy transport. What more could we ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: Dena Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Still unsure if this is a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Its good quality but it had the thing that screws in that levels the legs missing 1 and didn't have the pool sticks calling now to let them know because we cant even play it without these things
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Did more research after purchase made a mistake stuck with this junk unless I want to miss work to return it
customer_reviews.author: Violeta Sanders

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about the quality of a 'portable' table, but this table is really strong. Nothing chinsy about it. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Palleschi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Sturdy and well made table. We're having a blast with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Legit size pool table. Bigger than I thought it was but easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Balls roll not even
customer_reviews.text: Balls roll bag is cheep and breaks easy bigger then 6 feet middle needs leg for stability
customer_reviews.author: Kingamazon

customer_reviews.title: Decent portable table
customer_reviews.text: Reviews were a little mixed on this, especially where the size was concerned, so I was leery. We like it. It's definitely not a pool hall, but love the fact I can move it around and it doesn't take over. It plays a decent game of pool and keeps the family and friends hanging out.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Streamer

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product before I received it and I was even more ecstatic when I got it. Set up wasn’t hard just have a plan before setting up. It is heavy and will be much easier to set up with 2 people. Did come with a bruise but overall I’m satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: was not flat!
customer_reviews.text: the sides of the felt table are not rubber. No good for bank shots and it the table had a significant curve. It was not a matter of being level but the shape. I was so disappointed and should have expected this with the low price. Do not consider taking this risk.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not for real pool players (terrible!)
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at all the good reviews. The pockets aren't set correctly and the bumpers are too hard. Real players can't use it for practice and new players (that may want to play seriously) can't use it for learning! I wasted my time and effort on this because it was portable. I seriously regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MalcolmLewis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pool table!!!
customer_reviews.text: I play a lot of billiards and this table feels just like one you would see in bars. I highly recommend. The sticks are good sticks that are a little shorter, which I like since we are limited on space.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Table top made of wood
customer_reviews.text: Table top seems to be made of wood. So doesn't matter if you level it, the temperature will bend it. Balls will follow the path they want. You will see people complaing about balls going to center, others to crazy directions, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo de Freitas Vale

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The table is warped so balls end up stuck in the rails. I don't understand whats the point of making something as heavy as this yet have it be so useless. It defeats the purpose of what the table is for.
customer_reviews.author: Fireb0mb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pool table.
customer_reviews.text: This pool table is made well and I found the price was worth it, the table plays well and I have had no problems with this table. What you see in the advertising picture is what you’ll actually get.
customer_reviews.author: AL Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good pool table
customer_reviews.text: We got this table for our 12 yo son. The first one came bowed in the middle which makes pool tricky. Amazon replaced it with a new table, no questions asked, and the new table has been in constant use. For the money, it’s a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hathaway Fairmont Portable
feature_bullets: EASY TO TRANSPORT – This gorgeous table includes durable, steel legs that easily fold for transportation and storage. The included nylon carry bag is rip-resistant, keeping your table safe and secure while it’s on the go.

FAMILY FRIENDLY – The Fairmont’s compact 6-foot frame is perfect for kids learning the game. Adults will appreciate its high-quality construction and simple space-saving design A perfect addition to any game room gym or office.
NO ASSEMBLY REQUIRED – Every table ships fully assembled and ready to play. Simply unfold the legs and get the fun rolling.
DIMENSIONS - Table dimensions: 76" L x 43.25" W x 32" H - Playing surface: 66" L x 33" W. Rigid 1.25-in diameter steel easy-folding leg system with 1.5-in stabilizing leg levelers.
ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: Nylon carry bag, 2.25-in standard billiard balls, (2) 48-in two-piece pool cues, 2 pieces of chalk, table brush, and racking triangle.
180-day manufacturer warranty. We promise that it will arrive damage free with all necessary parts and accessories. Otherwise, we’ll send replacement parts or an entirely new table at no cost to you.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
